alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Webster, northeastern Christian and southeastern Greene Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 747 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ozark, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Ozark, Battlefield, Rogersville, Fordland, Brookline, Turners, Linden, Elkhead, Bruner and Galloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
